title: Iakov Chernikhov
content: I am sure that many of you with a different cultural background or better education than I are aware of [Iakov Chernikhov](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085104/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Iakov%20Chernikhov). I only just found out about him when a colleague forwarded me [Iakov Chernikhov International Foundation (ICIF)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085104/http:/www.icif.ru/Engl/index.htm). There's a nice [biography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085104/http:/www.icif.ru/Engl/about.htm), but the thing that really caught my eye was this: [Construction of the Classic Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085104/http:/www.icif.ru/Engl/cyc/font/index.htm#1). That and the awesomely awesome architectural drawings and other graphics.
author: Jon Whipple

comments.content:
